title: Minecraft 17w17a 发布
author: ruhuasiyu
txt_content:
本帖最后由 广药 于 2020-6-13 18:15 编辑 

每周快照是Minecraft的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。

然而，每周快照主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。
适用于正式版的Mod不兼容快照，且大多数Mod都不对每周快照提供支持。
Minecraft 1.12 仍未发布，17w17a为其第8个预览版。
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。



One step closer to 1.12! 
离1.12又进一步啦！
Last week was the last week to introduce new features for 1.12, and starting from this week we are focusing on polishing the new features, fixing as many bugs as possible and optimizing the game.
从本周开始我们将不再添加1.12的新特性，而着重于打磨已有的新特性，并尽可能地修复bug和优化游戏。

Changes in snapshot 17w17a
本次快照的变化

Added lots of new advancements and moved existing ones around
增加了大量新的进度，并调整了已有的一些进度。Gave terracotta blocks unique colours on the map
给予带釉陶瓦在地图上独特的颜色。Tweaks to the difficulty of the Illusioner
调整了 Illusioner 的难度。Reverted the purple skulker colour, sorry about that!
调回了潜影贝的颜色，很抱歉！New sound effects, including new note blocks notes!
新的音效，包括新的音符盒的音效！Made the tooltips in advancements UI overlay the screen
在进度页面小提示现在覆盖在该页面的上方。Technical: Added "UpdateLastExecution" nbt tag to command blocks, useful for loops
技术性：增加 nbt 标签  UpdateLastExecution 到命令方块，用于循环。Technical: Added bulk-granting/revoking to the /advancement command
技术性：增加用于大量给予/剥夺进度的命令。Technical: Allow advancements to trigger commands as rewards
技术性：允许进度通过reward触发命令。Technical: Optimized the recipe book a little
技术性：略微优化了合成书。Technical: Advancement icons now allow data values
技术性：现在进度中的图标允许带数据值。

漏洞修复：Fixed bug MC-114971 - Missing usage translation for '/advancement test' command
/advancement test 命令的帮助没有对应的翻译Fixed bug MC-114979 - advancement command doesn't allow bulk grant/revoking
大量给予/剥夺进度的指令未能工作Fixed bug MC-115056 - "Remote Gateway" advancement cannot be obtained by using ender pearls
"Remote Gateway"进度不能通过使用末影珍珠完成Fixed bug MC-115170 - Advancements Test Command Success Uses the Wrong Translation
/advancement test 命令执行成功未能被正确翻译Fixed bug MC-115173 - Unsuccessful advancement test command has player and advancement name interchanged
/advancement test 命令执行失败的提示中玩家和进度名位置错误Fixed bug MC-115574 - "Sniper Duel" advancement triggered when killing non-skeleton mob at distance
在一定距离外杀死骷髅以外的角色可以完成进度“狙击手的对决”Fixed bug MC-115740 - Inconsistent error message for /advancement grant @p *
/advancement grant @p * 指令会导致错误的提示信息Fixed bug MC-115805 - Fences/panes/walls/bars/torches connect to a number of non-solid blocks
栅栏/玻璃板/石墙/铁栏杆/火把会连接很多非固体方块Fixed bug MC-115821 - Tooltips with long titles in the advancements menu are cut off
进度页面的提示如果过长会被截断Fixed bug MC-115880 - 'Take Aim' advancement granted by projectiles other than arrows
“Take Aim”进度可由使用箭以外的投掷物获得Fixed bug MC-115936 - Narrator does not properly read output from /say, /tell and /tellraw command
讲述者不能正确地阅读/say, /tell,/ tellraw指令的内容Fixed bug MC-115940 - Division by zero crash with alternating /recipe commands
和/recipe 指令交互时除零会导致崩溃Fixed bug MC-116016 - Advancement "adventure/trade" uses criteria named "shot_arrow"
进度"adventure/trade" 使用的准则名为 shot_arrowFixed bug MC-116245 - "Zombie Doctor" advancement description has a period, while others don't
"Zombie Doctor"进展的描述多了一个句号Fixed bug MC-116471 - Conditional command blocks SuccessCount doesn't update
连锁型命令方块的SuccessCount不更新Fixed bug MC-116514 - "durability" option for item-based triggers succeeds for items without durability
基于物品的触发器的耐久(durability)选项对于无耐久的物品也能成功触发Fixed bug MC-116516 - "item_durability_changed" triggers when base change is 0, but not when Unbreaking reduces the change to 0
"item_durability_changed"触发器会在base change 是0时被触发，但是在Unbreaking导致其变为0时不触发Fixed bug MC-116617 - New AutoCraft Functionality Allows Spawning Arbitrary Items
新的自动合成会允许产生任意多的物品Fixed bug MC-116650 - Wooden fences connect to nether brick fences
木栅栏会连接地狱砖块栅栏Added some new bugs!
加入了一些新的漏洞！（特性）

Please report any and all bugs you find in Minecraft to bugs.mojang.com. If nobody reports a bug, we can’t fix it!
experimental development snapshots” and save. To switch to the normal version, you can select it in the dropdown at the bottom left corner of the launcher. Back up your world first or run the game on in a different folder (See the “new profile” dialog).
Snapshots can corrupt your world, please backup and/or run them in a different folder from your main worlds.
请在http://bugs.mojang.com报告Minecraft中的BUG。如果没人汇报BUG的话，我们无法修复它！
如果你想试玩快照，请打开官方启动器并点击“New Profile”按钮，选中“snapshots”并选择“Enable experimental development snapshots”并点击保存。如果想切换到普通的版本，你可以在启动器左下角按钮上方的下拉菜单中选择。在开始快照前备份你的世界或在不同的文件夹中启动快照（见“new profile”对话框）。
快照可能会玩坏你的存档，请千万记得备份存档和/或在与你的存档不同文件夹里运行。
